entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
